name: paypal-rest-api
description: A typescript module for integrating with PayPal REST APIs.
author: Andrew Throener

scripts.coverage: nyc blue-tape test/**/*-spec.ts | tap-spec && nyc report ---reporter=text
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && echo Using TypeScript && tsc --version && tsc --pretty
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run coverage
scripts.release: npm test && npm run build && npm version --
scripts.release:quick: npm test && npm run build && git add -A && git commit -m 'Quick Release Patch' && npm version patch && git push --tags
scripts.postversion: npm publish && git push && git push --tags
